message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is valued at $120 by you. Considering its high quality and unique features, I would like to propose a price of $110 for it. This offer allows you to enjoy significant savings while ensuring I receive a fair return for my efforts in sourcing and providing this valuable item. I believe this price strikes a great balance between value and cost. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.
